Lehigh Valley Charter High School for the Arts, or Charter Arts, is an audition-based, tuition-free public charter school, located in downtown Bethlehem, Pennsylvania, in the Lehigh Valley region of the state. The school's address is 321 East 3rd Street, Bethlehem, PA 18015.
The school first opened in September 2003 under the name Lehigh Valley Charter High School for the Performing Artsor '"LVCA"' before changing to its current name in 2012.
